Reviews.Title: Manufacturing defect / worthless warranty
Reviews.Author: Paul H. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son about 10 months ago.  About 5 months ago, the camera developed black lines and dots on the rear monitor.  We sent it in to Nikon for repair under their warranty.  Instead, we got a notice saying Nikon wanted to charge us $105.46 to repair the camera.  I called and asked why.  They said the problem was cause by undue pressure on the camera, as if something heavy had been set on it.When we bought the camera, we also purchased a hard shell case.  The camera has only been lightly used.  When it was not being used, it was in the hard case.  It has never been placed under pressure.  Furthermore, of the 14 reviews on Amazon, 3 mention this same problem.  Ours would make it 4 out of 15, or 27% failure rate.  Clearly, this is a re-occurring manufacturing defect.Not only will Nikon not honor their warranty by trying to blame the customer, but they want to charge $105.46 to repair a camera that currently new costs only $134.66.Do not buy this camera or from Nikon.  This model has a high failure rate, as evidenced by the responses to Amazon.  Nikon will not stand by or honor their warranty if the camera does fail.  They will, as they did to me, blame the user for the problem.  Then they will charge you 80% of the cost of a new camera to fix it.  Surely there are other companies that are service and customer oriented.

Reviews.Title: Nice For The Price
Reviews.Author: MarcKirk "SurfGramps"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera a for sticking in your pocket when your DSLR is just too much to deal with. It is very small. The photos and HD video are very good, but not quite as good as a full size DSLR or HD video camera, but that is to be expected. There are not a lot of manual adjustments available, but you can change the photo characteristics by setting different "scene types". You'll need to read the manual to figure this out. For video, you cannot use zoom. This is a nice, reasonably priced camera, but if it's your only one, I would recommend considering spending a little more on say the S8000.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Lisa "Nemesis"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes WONDERFUL dusk and low light photos without flash!  The flash is very powerful and when used properly the photo's are crystal clear.  I love the color, and has a time delay for taking self portraits.  It's about as big as some of the smart phones that are out right now so it wasn't a pain in the rear to carry around while I was on vacation.  It takes great video too.  Be sure to buy a class 6 or above memory card to speed up the photo recording time.  I bought a 6 but really thing this requires a 10.

Reviews.Title: Destroys Batteries after one charge
Reviews.Author: Karan L. Paulson "Perfectionist"
Reviews.Content: This camera worked great for a few months and then all at once it started to destroy batteries.I kept purchasing(3) high end recommended batteries and after about a month after they charged they went dead and would not recharge. This holds true for every battery I purchased.  I tried the batteries in my friends camera and they would not longer charge for her either.This has turned out to be a very expensive camera to operate.  I would recommend a Kodak with rechargable batteries for about $100 and forget the expensive Nikons.

Reviews.Title: grt!
Reviews.Author: ljl4575
Reviews.Content: even though i just got this camera so far it is amazing...we have a "real" professional camera that is too hard to carry around. i have a baby so i take a bunch of picts with no time for posing! so far this has been an excellent camera even in not good lighting. and it takes picts way quicker then these little cameras used to!definitely a grt buy!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: ogle-z
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as a replacement for a  Nikon s570 that was dropped. It is very similar, even using the same battery. It takes great pictures. Set up and menu functions are easy to use. You can turn it on and take a picture in less than a second, if you do not have a welcome screen selected. Otherwise it takes a little longer. Video mode is accessed by touching the record button while in still picture mode, and begins recording in a little less than two seconds. From start up to video recording is about five seconds. Overall seems like a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good little camera
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: This camera takes some really good pictures. But, it also does VIDEO! It's a little awkward holding the camera like a camcorder but it does some really good HD video. I used my windows 7 'DVD maker' to put the .avi files together and it worked flawlessly!!! Great for making some home movies and for parties. We made some Christmas movies of us opening gifts and our little dog playing. Be sure to get a Class 6 sdhc card to go with it. You will need the speed of the class 6 memory card. A great little camera for what it does.

Reviews.Title: Defective LCDs- don't buy this camera.
Reviews.Author: NK1
Reviews.Content: Same problem as 2 other reviewers.  My LCD screen developed a black defect after a few days.  I was able to exchange it for a new one.  The next one started developing the defects after about 6 weeks.  I may try my luck with the warranty.  Very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Display developed two dark spots
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: The display has developed two dark spots.....guess I'll be "deep sixing" it soon!!!  This is my first and most likely my last Nikon camera.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Melissa J. Kaempffe "Soccer Mom"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to replace an earlier version of the same model, which for one thing allows me to use the batteries I already had (giving me 3 now) and to lessen the 'learning curve' on a new camera. Just like the older model, this camera is easy to set up and use and the pictures are fabulous! I've only used the new one a couple of times, but am already very happy with it. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for something they can just take out of the box and start using without much effort (once the battery is charged....) and get great results. Nice camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: bad camera, disappointed
Reviews.Author: sean
Reviews.Content: I have bought more than 12 cameras for friend and me. I tried canon, panasonic lumix, and kodak. I studied and enjoyed them. My daughter needs a small camera for her project. I told myself that I should try another brand - nikon this time. I compared several types and pick the nikon  coolpix S5100. After my daughter received this camera, it never produced a good image. the picture looks good in the screen of camera, but really bad in computer. After 5 months, the battery was "exhausted" and wouldn't take a charge. In my memory, nikon and canon are two of the best camera maker. I am disappointed to nikon's camera. I will not recommend nikon's camera. Avoid nikon's camera if you can!!!!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Linda E Scheuer
Reviews.Content: I'm a photographer and I really love it - The only downside is the flash - its a little weak.

Reviews.Title: A Great Gift for My Granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Faye M. Creel
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for a ten year old and she loved it...especially the color.  It does all she needs it to do and it is simple to operate. I felt it was a great buy for what it offers.

Reviews.Title: ±Nikon ±Coolpix ±S5100
Reviews.Author: Bruce Fenton
Reviews.Content: this product was defective the camera would not take a picture when the flash was on. ±I really didn't get a chance to see what it would do.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Meagan
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera for a trip to turkey. Well the trip didn't happen but  I use it at disneyland a lot and it takes amazing pictures.

Reviews.Title: Noxon Camera
Reviews.Author: Baschuette
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera it is alot smaller than my old one. I think I chose a good camera to get as a replacemen

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Maddie
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is an excellent point and shoot camera. Great quality pictures and stunning HD videos make this $70 camera worth every cent! The battery life is not quite as long as other cameras I've owned, but as long as you remember to charge it, it's not a problem.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S5100 for photomicrography
Reviews.Author: Robert S. Richmond "old harp singer"
Reviews.Content: I bought my Nikon Coolpix S5100 through Amazon and have been quite pleased with it. This review is focused on a very specific use of the camera - photomicrography.Recently I bought a Nikon Coolpix S5100 to replace my aging (5 years or so) Coolpix L1. I wanted a camera that would enable me to shoot photomicrographs through the eyepiece lens of an ordinary binocular microscope. Small-hospital pathologists often aren't allowed specialized cameras for photomicrography. The Coolpix doesn't produce publication quality photomicrographs, but they're good enough for hospital cancer conferences and the like.To set the Coolpix S5100 for photomicrography, use the close-up setting (with the flower logo), and set it to AF Area Mode (page 46 of the documentation). Rack the zoom lens out as far out as it will go. Turn the flash off.Use more illumination in the microscope than you need for ordinary use of the microscope. Press the front of the camera directly against the microscope's ocular, and move the camera until you see the microscopic image in the viewfinder. Then take the picture.You'll get better results at higher magnifications (including oil immersion), though the S5100 performs considerably better with lower power objectives than the L1 did.The jpg you get will be considerably vignetted and the color and contrast will be poor, and you will need to take the image to Photoshop Elements or a similar graphics editor to get an adequate image. Dimension the image at 1280 x 960 pixels for optimal display in PowerPoint.Put the PowerPoint presentation on a key drive (thumb drive, flash drive), take it to the conference, and plug it into the computer that operates the radiologists' PACS presentation.I didn't realize just how complicated this is until I tried to describe it!I've posted a couple of photomikes on my Flickr Web site atbobrichmond on Flickr.

Reviews.Title: Useless Warranty
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Bobby"
Reviews.Content: Two Months ago I selected this camera,because of its light weight, to take on vacation instead of my full frame digital Canon. While on vacation I took approximately 400 images. About halfway through, the monitor developed a large smudge. On returning from vacation the images were downloaded. The smudge on the monitor was not reflected on the downloaded images. I wrapped up the defective camera and sent it to the service department for warranty service.  Two days after mailing the camera I received an e-mail saying the repair costs are estimated at $87 with the statement "LCD screen is cracked/bleeding and the repair was not covered by the warranty.I do nor recall abusing the camera. The only possibility was that I put it in my shirt pocket along with my eyeglasses.

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: Javier Leon
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS CAMARA ON DECEMBER LAST YEAR, AND SIX MONTHS LATER ONE SMALL SPOT IN THE DISPLAY APPEARED; THEN IT GREW TO 1/4" DIAMETER; THEN TWO WEEKS AGO THE CAMERA DID NOT SHOOT OR DID NOT OPEN THE SHUTTER. BASED ON PREVIOUS REVIEW I AM NOT EVEN BOTHER TRYING TO SEND IT FOR REPAIR, INSTEAD I PREFERED TO LET EVERYBODY KNOWS HOW BAD THIS PRODUCT FROM NIKON IS. I DEFINITELY DO NOT RECOMMEND TO ANYONE TO PURCHASE A NIKON COOLPIX CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: Bought as gift
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: Bought as gift for gf who has DSLR.  Pictures aren't as good, but she likes it well enough for on-the-go pictures when she doesn't want to carry around the bigger camera.

Reviews.Title: AWSOME Camera
Reviews.Author: Angela Barnwell
Reviews.Content: This is my 5th Nokia digital phone.. I loved the 710 but this 5100 is great. Takes good pictures and videos, pocket size, easy to work with. I must say the 4100 is also a great camera I just didn't like the touch screen. It was basicly the same camera, I sent the 4100 back.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!!
Reviews.Author: sivlin
Reviews.Content: Okay, so i just received the camera today, and i have to say, it's pretty amazingggg!! I'm in love with it! (: It's everything I ever expected... I would definitley recommend it to others!! Thank youuu! (:

Reviews.Title: Screen developed a huge smudge shortly after receiving it
Reviews.Author: Nici
Reviews.Content: I was really excited about this camera, I pre ordered it and everything. After about two weeks of having the camera (in a case in my purse) a huge line across the bottom of the screen formed. As time progressed and I used the camera the line began to spread larger, although it's not reflected on the photos it's an eye sore to look at. I also wasn't a 100% satisfied with the quality of the pictures. The color of the camera (blue) is pretty though on a higher note :).

Reviews.Title: Nikon  S5100 is very simple camera
Reviews.Author: Albanian mafia
Reviews.Content: I replaced my old Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W370 what a piece a junk do not buy it I did the mistake for you so I replaced with the Nikon S5100.The Nikon  S5100 is very simple camera & a good price. I thing the picture came out Good. The best camera is Canon PowerShot SD780 IS & 2 Nikon S5100 & EST for budget price. Do not buy a Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W junk junk

Reviews.Title: Lens Error - Huge Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Mary G Kane
Reviews.Content: HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT. Just purchased for Christmas present. Good thing I checked to make sure camera worked before giving as present. I charged the battery, turned camera on, and LENS DOES NOT WORK. Lens retracts after a second or two and "LENS ERROR" message appears on LCD screen. Removed and reinstalled battery and tried a few more times...still same lens error.  Sending back to Amazon.  Will purchase another brand camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.2-megapixel CCD sensor; 5x wide-angle optical Zoom-Nikkor glass lens
2.7-inch bright (230,000-dot) display; 4-way VR Image Stabilization system
HD (720p) Movie with one-touch recording for easy operation
Smart Portrait System; 18 Scene Modes including Scene Auto Selector
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory card (not included)
2.7-inch LCD display
12.2-megapixel CCD sensor; 5x wide-angle optical Zoom-Nikkor glass lens; (230,000-dot) display; 4-way VR Image Stabilization system
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix S5100 12 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Blue)
